summary: Upgraded /research command with domain override flags (--lean, --logic, --math, --latex, --typst). Fixed routing table to match skill-agent-mapping reference. Added STAGE 1.5 for flag parsing and effective_domain determination. Updated command-reference.md with flag documentation.

artifacts.summary: Added domain flags, STAGE 1.5 parsing, updated routing table
Added logic, math, typst routing entries
Implementation summary with all phase details

completion_data.completion_summary: Added 5 domain override flags to /research command enabling explicit routing to lean, logic, math, latex, and typst research skills. Fixed outdated routing table and documented in command-reference.md.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Updated research.md (argument-hint, Options, STAGE 1.5, STAGE 2), routing.md (added logic/math/typst), command-reference.md (flag documentation)

next_steps: Review implementation. Phase 6 (Context Knowledge Task) is deferred until context-knowledge-template.md is created.
